message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for $12000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I believe we can come to a more agreeable price. How about $9500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9500. How about we meet in the middle at $11000?
I appreciate your effort to meet halfway, Alice. Considering my budget, how about we settle at $10500?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I'm not going any lower than that. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you
